title: Cruise Line Offers 4-Year Trip For Americans Who Want To Skip Trump's Term

title: Pak Influencer Deactivates Social Media Accounts After Private Video Leaks

title: Trump Net Worth Dips $300 Million As Truth Social Parent's Stocks Stumble
content: Donald Trump's net worth has taken a $300 million hit following a dip in the shares of Trump Media & Technology Group, the parent company of Truth Social.

title: "In This Day And Age...": S Jaishankar's Sharp Take On Russia Ties Question
content: Known for his no-nonsense articulation of India's position on geopolitical issues, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar had a sharp response when an Australian journalist asked him if New Delhi recognises Canberra's "angst" over ties with Russia

title: Byju's US Units Wrongly Stripped Of Education App, Court Rules
content: Two money-making education apps that are part of the troubled Byju's software empire were wrongly transferred away from US lenders and must be returned to a court-supervised bankruptcy trustee, a federal judge ruled Tuesday.
summary: Two money-making education apps that are part of the troubled Byju's software empire were wrongly transferred away from US lenders and must be returned to a court-supervised bankruptcy trustee, a federal judge ruled Tuesday.

title: In This Country, Cold War Relics Are Coming Back To Life. Here's How
content: Albania is seeing a rebirth of its communist-era military structures. No, not to prepare for a war. The country has turned old bunkers and barracks into tourist destinations.
summary: Albania is seeing a rebirth of its communist-era military structures. No, not to prepare for a war. The country has turned old bunkers and barracks into tourist destinations.

title: "Dark Tourism" Finds New Destination In Los Angeles Murder Mansion
content: Exactly 28 years after the jury convicted the Menendez brothers, the house was sold for $17 million in March 2024.

title: Jeff Bezos' Ex-Wife Mackenzie Scott Slashes Amazon Stake By Another $8 Billion
content: MacKenzie Scott, the ex-wife of Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, received around 400 million Amazon shares as part of her divorce settlement in 2019.

title: 14 Dead As Bus With Wedding Guests Falls Into River In Pak, Bride Survives
content: A bus carrying 25 passengers returning from a wedding plunged into a river late Tuesday in Gilgit-Baltistan.

title: Peanut, The Famous Squirrel Euthanised In US, Didn't Have Rabies: Report

title: Airlines Cancel Flights After Volcanic Eruptions. Why That's A Good Thing
content: At least three airlines cancelled flights between Australia and Bali this week after a volcano eruption in eastern Indonesia spewed a vast plume of volcanic ash into the air.
summary: At least three airlines cancelled flights between Australia and Bali this week after a volcano eruption in eastern Indonesia spewed a vast plume of volcanic ash into the air.

title: 18th Century Sculpture Bought For Rs 540 Could Sell For Over Rs 2.68 Crore
content: A marble bust bought for £5 (around Rs 540) and long used as a doorstop may soon fetch over £2.5 million (Rs 2.68 crore).
summary: A marble bust bought for £5 (around Rs 540) and long used as a doorstop may soon fetch over £2.5 million (Rs 2.68 crore).

title: Donald Trump Sets 'Existential' Battle Against China With Cabinet Picks

title: Video: Masked Man In New York Attempts To Snatch Child From Father's Arms

title: In This Australian City, Thousands Line Up To See 'Corpse Flower'
content: Thousands of people queued up in the city of Geelong, south of Melbourne in Australia, to catch a glimpse of what's once-in-a-decade occurrence -- the blooming 'corpse flower'.

title: UK Writer Samantha Harvey Wins 2024 Booker For 136-Page Novel "Orbital"
content: Samantha Harvey's "Orbital" is the second-shortest novel to win the award and the first to be set in space.
